info.name: Brooklyn Sofa 3S
info.LongDescription:
OVERVIEW
Inspired by mid-century design and upholstered in full-grain leather, the Brooklyn sofa will add vintage glamour to any living room. The rich detailing of cushion piping, plush feather-fibre blend filled cushions and the smooth feel of the old saddle-like leather are key features.
Gently flared, sheltering arm rests define the Brooklyn. Raised well up off the floor, the sofa framework envelops the large, loose fibre, foam and feather-topped cushions further adding to the Brooklyn’s sink-in comfort and urban-loft aesthetic.
 
“Just looking at the Brooklyn one can see that its top-quality heirloom leather is as soft and as supple as an old glove.” Freedom sofa buyer.
info.description:
Shown in Oxford Leather in Tan.

OVERVIEW
Inspired by mid-century design and upholstered in full-grain leather, the Brooklyn sofa will add vintage glamour to any living room. The rich detailing of cushion piping, plush feather-fibre blend filled cushions and the smooth feel of the old saddle-like leather are key features.

Gently flared, sheltering arm rests define the Brooklyn. Raised well up off the floor, the sofa framework envelops the large, loose fibre, foam and feather-topped cushions further adding to the Brooklyn’s sink-in comfort and urban-loft aesthetic.
 
“Just looking at the Brooklyn one can see that its top-quality heirloom leather is as soft and as supple as an old glove.” Freedom sofa buyer.
